amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 118-656 to add to the findings of Congress an outline of the constitutional role for the legislative and executive branches in the treaty-making process.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Massie amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Massie amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
